meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Fasten</kanji> everything into <kanji>one</kanji>. <vocabulary>All together</vocabulary> in one <vocabulary>batch</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>lump</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Watch out for the shortened いち.
